author: Osye
title: Hotel Near Chong Wen Men Station
text:
We stayed here for 3 nights in November 2016.
The location is great. The hotel is next to subway station Chong Wen Men (Lines 2 and 5) so it's easy to going around the city. There’s no lift in the exit, so prepare to carry your luggage up.
The room was spacious and clean. But the room was warm, the aircon wasn’t working. We asked the staff about it and they said that because it’s winter so the aircon only blowing warm air. Well, we expected our room to be cool not warm.
Got WIFI in the room.
The concierge staffs was helpful too.
